dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, another wanderer stumbles into my domain. What business do you have here, mere mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through this cavern. Will you let me pass?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Passage through these depths is earned, not granted. What can you offer me in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you precious gems from the surface.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gems, you say? Hmm, a tempting offer. Very well, pass through and leave your tribute. You may proceed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no treasures, but I am willing to fight you for passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Let us see if your blade is as sharp as your tongue!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm to you or your kin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Ha! Your kind brings nothing but chaos and destruction. Convince me, why should I not strike you down now?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you knowledge of the surface world and its wonders.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge, you say? Ignorance has its own charm, but I shall entertain your offer. Speak, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your suspicions. Let me prove my intentions through a small task.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tasks, tricks, mortal games... I tire of them. Prove yourself quickly or face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your might. Prepare yourself for a battle like no other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? Few dare to test my strength. Are you sure you wish to face the Cavernous Reaper in combat?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no creature, not even a Death Knight like you. Face me now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold, but foolish. Let us see if your courage matches your bravado!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize, I spoke out of turn. I will take my leave and trouble you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! The timid scurry away when faced with true power. Begone from my sight, coward!
